data.actual_result: No emoji code is entered into the text box
data.expected_result: Emoji should be added to the text field in written form again ie :emoji:
data.short_description: Trying to add emoji via search in emoji drawer doesn't work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the emoji drawer - Tap the looking glass icon - Scroll through and find any emoji you wish to add - Tap the emoji - It will close out the emoji drawer and return to the chat but the emoji code will not be in the text box ie :emoji:
